mapper.select: select number_idx, category_idx, m_idx, title, content, readcnt from FAQ where category_idx = #{category_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into FAQ (f.number_idx, f.m_idx, f.title, f.content, f.readcnt, c.category_name) from FAQ f join CATEGORY c on f.category_idx = c.category_idx value (#{f.m_idx}, #{f.title}, #{f.content}, #{c.category_name})
